SQL_STMT_U.val:
--*** BeforeChangeValue EXTRAPOLATION -- 1. 100/SupplyCapacity = TonerProSeite(ideal) update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set BefChValue_extrapol = BeforeChangeValue-(100/convert(decimal(7,2),SupplyCapacity))*(case when coleranttype='black' then (case when isnull(d_ZaehlerGesamt_dead,0)<>0 then isnull(d_ZaehlerGesamt_dead,0)-AfterChange_DeadVolume else -1 end) else (case when isnull(d_ZaehlerFarbe_dead,0)<>0 then isnull(d_ZaehlerFarbe_dead,0)-AfterChange_DeadVolume else -1 end) end ) from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and BeforeChangeValue>0 and SupplyCapacity>0 -- 2. TonerProSeite(real) Update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set BefChValue_extrapolReal = BeforeChangeValue- TonerProSeite*(case when coleranttype='black' then (case when isnull(d_ZaehlerGesamt_dead,0)<>0 then isnull(d_ZaehlerGesamt_dead,0)-(100.00-AfterChangeValue)/TonerProSeite else 0 end) else (case when isnull(d_ZaehlerFarbe_dead,0)<>0 then isnull(d_ZaehlerFarbe_dead,0)-(100.00-AfterChangeValue)/TonerProSeite else 0 end) end) from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and TonerProSeite<>0
update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set BefChValue_extrapol = BefChValue_extrapolReal where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and BefChValue_extrapolReal<BeforeChangeValue and BefChValue_extrapolReal>0 -- 3. Korrektur wenn BefChValue_extrapol nicht annehmbare Werte angenommen hat! Update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set BefChValue_extrapol = BeforeChangeValue from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and BefChValue_extrapol> BeforeChangeValue or BefChValue_extrapol<0 or BefChValue_extrapol is null
--*** CHANGEDATE EXTAPOLATION --***** Extrapolation des ChangeDatums = BeforChangeDate + "DATE ((Zaehler(BeforChangeDate) + (BeforeChangeValue-BefChValue_extrapol)/TonerProSeite(real oder ideal))" --***** BEDINGUNG: BeforeChangeDate >= ChangeDate_extrapol <= AfterChangeDate -- *** 1. TonerProSeite(ideal) = 100.00/SupplyCapacity update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set ChangeDate_extrapol= CASE WHEN Coleranttype ='black' THEN (Select MIN(b.Datum) from STAT_TonerZaehler b where a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and b.IDNR=a.IDNR and b.Zaehler_Gesamt>= ((Select c.Zaehler_Gesamt from STAT_TonerZaehler c where a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 and c.IDNR=a.IDNR and c.Datum=a.BeforeChangeDate) +(a.BeforeChangeValue-a.BefChValue_extrapol)/100.00*a.SupplyCapacity)) ELSE (Select MIN(b.Datum) from STAT_TonerZaehler b where a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and b.IDNR=a.IDNR and b.Zaehler_Farbe>= ((Select c.Zaehler_Farbe from STAT_TonerZaehler c where a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 and c.IDNR=a.IDNR and c.Datum=a.BeforeChangeDate) +(a.BeforeChangeValue-a.BefChValue_extrapol)/100.00*a.SupplyCapacity)) END from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange a where a.Ebene1=:1 and a.Ebene2=:2 and a.Ebene3=:3 and a.Ebene4=:4 and a.SupplyCapacity>1
-- *** 2. TonerProSeite (real) update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set ChangeDate_extrapol= CASE WHEN Coleranttype ='black' THEN (Select MIN(b.Datum) from STAT_TonerZaehler b where a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and b.IDNR=a.IDNR and b.Zaehler_Gesamt>= ((Select c.Zaehler_Gesamt from STAT_TonerZaehler c where a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 and c.IDNR=a.IDNR and c.Datum=a.BeforeChangeDate) +(a.BeforeChangeValue-a.BefChValue_extrapol)/a.TonerProSeite)) ELSE (Select MIN(b.Datum) from STAT_TonerZaehler b where a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and b.IDNR=a.IDNR and b.Zaehler_Farbe>= ((Select c.Zaehler_Farbe from STAT_TonerZaehler c where a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 and c.IDNR=a.IDNR and c.Datum=a.BeforeChangeDate) +(a.BeforeChangeValue-a.BefChValue_extrapol)/a.TonerProSeite)) END from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange a where a.Ebene1=:1 and a.Ebene2=:2 and a.Ebene3=:3 and a.Ebene4=:4 and a.TonerProSeite>0 -- *** 3. ChangeDate_extrapol = BeforechangeDate wenn BeforeChangeValue=BefChValue_extrapol update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set ChangeDate_extrapol= BeforeChangeDate from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and BeforeChangeValue=BefChValue_extrapol -- *** 4. restliche ChangeDate_extrapol-Werte, die auÃŸerahlb der BEDINGUNG liegen "einnorden" update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set ChangeDate_extrapol= CASE WHEN ChangeDate_extrapol<BeforeChangeDate THEN BeforeChangeDate ELSE AfterChangeDate END from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and ChangeDate_extrapol not between BeforeChangeDate and AfterChangeDate
update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set TonerDifference_extrapol= 100-BefChValue_extrapol where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4
update STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set TonerNetto_DeckDiff = (1-SupplyCapacity*TonerProSeite/100)*TonerDifference_extrapol from STAT_TonerZaehlerChange where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and TonerProSeite>0
update dbo.STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set LossByTonerChange = (BefChValue_extrapol)/100*SupplyPrice where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4
update dbo.STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set NettoByTDeckDiff = (TonerNetto_DeckDiff)/100*SupplyPrice where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4
update dbo.STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set TonerDeckung = SupplyCapacity/100*TonerProSeite* (case when TonerDeckung is null then 5 else TonerDeckung end) where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4
update dbo.STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set DeadVol_Percent_Farbe = 100*d_ZaehlerFarbe_dead/(d_ZaehlerFarbe_dead + d_ZaehlerFarbe) where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and d_ZaehlerFarbe_dead>0 or d_ZaehlerFarbe>0
update dbo.STAT_TonerZaehlerChange set DeadVol_Percent_Gesamt = 100*d_ZaehlerGesamt_dead/(d_ZaehlerGesamt_dead + d_ZaehlerGesamt) where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and d_ZaehlerGesamt_dead>0 or d_ZaehlerGesamt>0
